column3:
“Smoked this out of a gas mask bong last night with some friends. It actually doesn't have too strong of a smell, but the scent is mostly cheesey and skunky, with undertones of diesel and a very faint pine aroma.

The nugs are dense and light green with a moderate amount of orange hairs scattered throughout. Trichome content is heavy.

The high was relaxing, giggly, and somewhat psychedelic with a moderate amount of h...”
“This is one of the best (and most pungent smelling) weeds I've smoked. The New York Cheese that I smoked is from Southern Oregon.”
“Awesome! Felt amazing. Super social with friends. Lasted extremely long! Good stuff bruh!”
“Still remains my best high! Creative. Happy. Energetic. No come down. NY Cheese for president!”
“see for your strange but excited to smoke more nice”
“Tasty. Vaped. Had a pine needle like quality to it. Helped keep me up on only a few hours of sleep, def gave me the munchies.”

“My best high to date! 
Instant uplifting high, that lasts for hours!
High'ly recommended!”
“It got my mind buzzing but not a whole lot of anything else. I had it for quite some time (about a week) and grew really tired of it fairly soon.”
“Nice, alert calm, all in one, very good.  Upper!!!!!”

“amazing. psychedelic, stimulating, focus attention, decreases inflammation very effectively throughout my body. mainly, provides lucid creativity in a fun mood. a perfecto strain. also extremely good at relieving eye pressure.
shifts body into another dimension. reminiscent of the good old days.”
“I love it, but it makes me hungry af. Make sure you have plenty of food👌”

“Still my best high to date! 
Came across it once & never again. 😔
Instant uplifting high that lasts for hours!
High'ly recommended!”
“Smoked a bowl of this and totally lost track of time. Very smooth uplifting smoke. Great if you're a gamer. Oh, and have munchies on deck..you gonna need. Def get again.”

“Clear headed buzz great for daytime. Very smooth smoke. Dense light green nugs lots of orange hairs. Pine and cheese aroma( or maybe like burnt cheese). Munchies like there's a hole in my leg. Buy only if you're looking to change it up from the loud heavyweights.”
